title: Trading?
body:
i've been told that i can trade as long as these requirements are met :
1-**guy you're trading with has been on your friends list for 24 hours or more.**
2-**the shard you're trading is equal the same price for both sides. for example (yasuo skin worth 1000 RP trading for a teemo skin worth 1000 RP)**
and that you can only trade 3 ''champions'' in 1 Year

Is that true?

replies.body:
Trading is not a feature in League of Legends, and I've never heard of this specific concept. You can certainly *gift* another player champions, skins, and other content, but not trade content with a direct trading system.

You can find our gifting guide [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions.

Are there any plans (or far off, vaguely mentioned, utopic ideas) for doing anything with trading what loot is concerned. Ever since loot has come out, my friends and I have been discussing how being able to trade skin/champion shards would be an awesome addition to this already great system.
Where did you hear this from?  I haven't seen any news about a trading system being added to the game.
